altername_name: La Casa al Otro Lado de la Tormenta
name: The House on the Other Side of the Storm
overview: You are an empath. You can contact the dead and hear "echoes" of events long past. And, like all the empaths, as your father and grandfather were, you are restless and adventurous. And that's why you find yourself sailing the ether with the family flying boat, investigating one of the most dangerous Ghost Zones, where the cataclysms that shaped the world took place. What you will discover in an old abandoned house will shed a very sinister light on the origin of everything ... English translation by Pablo Martínez Merino and Gareth Pitchford.
